name: LD42-GettingOverGoldHoarding (Web Version)
description:
De-clutter your dragon lair that's become overflowing with gold!!! Buy Chests from the shopkeeper. Use chests to collect gold. When the chest is full, deposit it in the middle of the room.
Depositing Chests give you respect points so you can purchase more from the shop. Get some help from the village folks who will collect gold for you, but make sure they have a chest otherwise they'll be angry.

Keep the shopkeeper safe. If too much gold surrounds him, he’ll drown.

---------------------------
Controls:
---------------------------
WASD: Move around
Left Click: pick up chest/purchase item
Double Right Click: shoot fireball
Mouse: aim fireball
E: Open shop menu (Must be near the Shopkeeper)

---------------------------
Game also has Leader Board
